features.title: Why Choose Us
features.subtitle: Complete solutions to make development simpler and more efficient
features.desc1: 100+ beautiful built-in components including buttons, cards, icons, ready to use out of the box.
features.desc2: Lightweight and fast, using the latest tech stack, excellent performance for both development and user experience.
features.desc3: Convention over configuration, following industry best practices, quick start with guaranteed code quality.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: Through innovative technology and best practices, help developers quickly build high-quality web applications, improving development efficiency and user experience.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: Become a leader in frontend development, promote the development of web technology, and contribute more valuable tools and solutions to the developer community.

innovation.title: Innovation Driven

user.title: User First

quality.title: Code Quality

teamwork.title: Team Collaboration
